description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The hit game Avatar Quizcall is back to brighten up your holiday season, step up to the stage and take part in the ultimate holiday quiz. With one to four players, global highscore tables and region specific questions. It's not a party unless it's a Avatar Quizcall party, let's see who is the smartest cookie in the jar.
